thread.title: 2017 Ford F-350 Super Duty 6.7L Diesel V-8 4×4 Tested: New Steering, New Body, New Engine
thread.title_full: 2017 Ford F-350 Super Duty 6.7L Diesel V-8 4×4 Tested: New Steering, New Body, New Engine

author: Alexander Stoklosa
title: 2017 Ford F-350 Super Duty 6.7L Diesel V-8 4×4 Tested: New Steering, New Body, New Engine
text:
-Longtime readers of this publication can probably recall a car review (or several) that hinged on steering feel and response. But can you name one where that specific attribute defined a full-size, heavy-duty pickup truck? The 2017 Ford F-350 Platinum is most definitely not a sports car, and yet here we are zeroing in on its steering. READ MORE ›› 
-
